code:
```mermaid
%% Functional Specification Diagram with System Integration Labels
flowchart TD
    A[Start] --> B[Retrieve customer data from CRM]
    B -.->|CRM Integration| C[Initiate outbound call via Call Center System]
    C -.->|Call Center System| D{Customer answers?}
    D -- Yes --> E[AI Bot presents initial offer]
    E --> F{Offer accepted?}
    F -- Yes --> G[Transfer call to human agent]
    G -.->|Call Center System| H[End call]
    F -- No --> I[AI Bot retries with next offer (up to 3 times)]
    I --> J{Attempts exhausted?}
    J -- No --> E
    J -- Yes --> K[End call]
    D -- No --> K
    K -.->|Database Integration| L[Save call outcome to Database]
    L --> M[Stop]
```
